title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.25 - Median strip and crossovers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.25 - Median strip and crossovers

State Regulations

The median strip between the laned roadways in the parkway
system, including crossovers and areas beyond the laned roadways, shall not be
used by vehicles or persons on foot for any purpose except official purposes, or in emergencies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
